titles.title: Limiting Investor and Homeowner Loss in Foreclosure Act of 2014
To limit investor and homeowner losses in foreclosures, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 5/7/2014--Introduced. Limiting Investor and Homeowner Loss in Foreclosure Act of 2014 - Authorizes a bankruptcy court to establish a loss mitigation program for the negotiation of consensual alternatives to avoid foreclosure between an individual debtor and the holder of a claim secured by a security interest in the debtor's principal residence.
